name: Pacifist Tako and the Curse of Lady Die
name_original: Pacifist Tako and the Curse of Lady Die
description:
Lady Die has cursed the inhabitants of the kingdom! Help Tako the pacifist turtle defeat his enemies without fighting, and save the land from Lady Die's curse.

This is a boss rush game where you need quick reactions.

Controls: arrow keys

Made for the GMTK 2022 game jam, together with Annelies De Decker & Mark Van Acker. Music by Jens Van Assche.
